channel.title: Chase the Skunk Website Updates
channel.description: Up-to-date additions and changes to Chase the Skunk's website!

item.title: Casarok Creation Myth
item.description: Added a new page that details the story behind Casarok's creation. http://chasetheskunk.com/world/myths/myth-of-the-six-sisters.html

item.title: Transformation Polls
item.description: Added a new page with various transformation-based Twitter polls.

item.title: Magic Classes Catalog
item.description: Added a new page detailing various magic classes, including a few new ones.

item.title: New Bestiary Entry: Cait Sith
item.description: Added a new page to the Bestiary in the World section for the Cait Sith species. Also fixed a couple of errors.

item.title: Site is Live!
item.description: The site has finally gone live! Welcome, everyone! :)
